mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM sys_user a where a.user_name = #{userName} limit 1

SELECT DISTINCT d.perms FROM sys_user a, sys_user_role b, sys_role_menu c, sys_menu d WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND b.role_id = c.role_id AND c.menu_id = d.menu_id AND d.perms != '' AND a.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT b.role_key FROM sys_user_role a, sys_role b, sys_user c WHERE a.user_id = c.user_id AND a.role_id = b.role_id AND c.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.* FROM sys_user a
and a.dept_id = #{dsearch.eptId}
